channel.title: Jarring a client wont work for anny reason :(
channel.description:
So well after following a couple of youtube tutorials on how to jarr a client i was trying to make my own jarred client
So i tested it on a 317 first and it seemed to work
So if you jarred the client you only need to sign it so others can play on it but i wanted to test that before i was going to sign the jar
But on the 317 i pressed the Client.jar and it popped up but on the client i need jarred it doosnt popup :/
also i have 1 certificate after signing the jar so what i'm suposed to do :( if anny 1 can help me pls pm me :'(

item.title: Jarring a client wont work for anny reason :(
item.dc:creator: @miller4 miller4
item.description:
@miller4 wrote:

Well, you have to have teamviewer open anyways, tell me when to connect, if you have skype add me : RatTheStack

Read full topic
